MESSAGE: Hello! My name is Arnold!
Nice to meet you!
It's a beautiful new day!
OH NO! NOT AGAIN.....
Touch the lightning!
Move your pointer around!
Oh no! The lightning lit the tree on fire!
Press the space bar!
Arnold is stuck in the tree!
Tap the down arrow to get him down!
I think you tapped too hard!
Press the right arrow key to keep going!
This fire is getting out of control!
WHOA! IT'S SO MUCH WORSE!
Drag the hose to put it out!
Ok! Now drop the hose.
The fire is gone!
But Arnold's family is still stuck in the tree...
Click the koalas to save them!
SURPRISE! Arnold is alive!
The family has been reunited with only a couple of serious burns.
A nice lady has come to save Arnold and his family!
She is taking them to the hospital to help their burns!
Arnold has met the doctor and is in a lot of pain from the burns.
Rub his burns to heal them.
Arnold is all better now!
Now that you're all better, the nice lady is taking you back home!
Press the left arrow key to get back home!
Arnold and his family made it home safely!
Touch the trees around Arnold to feed him!
